snippet.title: 50K VIEWS SPECIAL: Comics walkthrough (Apple II - Accolade)
snippet.description:
You are Steve Keene, a spy saving the world from evil forces. Comics was one of the most unique game created for the Apple II. The story unfolds like a comic strip and takes on different paths depending on the decision chosen by the player.

Comics (http://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/accolades-comics-featuring-steve-keene-thrillseeker) was a graphics action adventure game published by Accolade in 1987 for the Apple ][.

This is a very unique game and there is nothing really like it on the Apple ][. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

Credits:
Walkthrough - www.textfiles.com (Martin Brunner)
